channel.title: Command & Conquer Generals 2
channel.description:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w6bg6yhyTK4[/youtube]
I just would like to show mopar that this game is coming out, I love C & C, and they haven't came out with a new generals game ever sense zero hour, which is a fun game also, if you have never played a C & C game, I recommend Renegade, or the generals series, Renegade is 1st person, and generals is 3rd person, so which ever one you like you can take a run at playing it :P
/discuss

I use to play these won’t be participating in the new one. I prefer old school.
